title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for a file that is already open in a different type of editor, nothing happens. It does not open a new editor for the file.
EB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for a file that is already open in a different type of editor, a new editor should be opened for the file.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the scripted resource editor example. 2. Create a new basic project. 3. Create a new file named 'test.xml'. 4. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'. 5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'. The expected behavior is that a new editor should be opened for the file, disregarding the fact that the file is already open in a different editor type.
